Plot: A series of brutal murders puts the lives of three men on a collision course: The father of the latest victim now out for revenge, a vigilante police detective operating outside the ...
Title: Big Bad Wolves
Actors: Tzahi Grad, Lior Ashkenazi, Rotem Keinan, Doval'e Glickman
tomatoConsensus: With just enough black humor to lighten the disturbing subject matter, Big Bad Wolves is as rewarding as it is challenging.
